description: Palindromes with even number of digits.
comments: Concatenation of n with reverse of n (keeping leading zeros in the reverse).A178788(a(n)) = 0 for n > 1. - _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jun 30 2010All of the terms are divisible by eleven. - _James Burling_, Aug 08 2014
links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
prog: (Haskell)a056524 n = a056524_list !! (n-1)a056524_list = [read (ns ++ reverse ns) :: Integer |                n <- [0..], let ns = show n]-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Dec 28 2011
author: _Henry Bottomley_, Jun 16 2000
